bill_title: to permit the Department of Transportation to undertake certain joint highway maintenance activities with North Dakota.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to permit the Department of Transportation to undertake certain joint highway maintenance activities with North Dakota. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the Department of Transportation may enter into agreements with the state of North Dakota for the provision of highway construction or maintenance activities and services in counties in either state that are adjacent to the boundary between the two states. Such services or activities may include the sharing of sand or salt stockpiles and the reassigning of winter road maintenance responsibilities on the following sections of highways: US Highway 85 south from the border to Ludlow to be maintained by North Dakota, North Dakota Highway 49 north from the border to Cedar River to be maintained by South Dakota, US Highway 83 north from the border to the junction with North Dakota Highway 11 to be maintained by South Dakota, South Dakota Highway 63 from the border south to McLaughlin to be maintained by North Dakota, and the Interstate 29 interchange at the border with South Dakota plowing the southbound on-ramp and the northbound off-ramp and North Dakota plowing the southbound off-ramp and northbound on- ramp.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
